name: leakSMART
0:
”Alexa, turn on the Valve”
”Alexa, turn off the Valve”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
leakSMART™ is a complete home water leak detection system. It detects leaks via leakSMART wireless sensors that are placed throughout your home, and then immediately shuts off your home's water with the leakSMART automatic shut-off valve to stop water damage before it can even start. 

With Amazon Alexa, your leakSMART system's valve can be opened or closed using just your voice.
